pricing_notes: Pricing details are not publicly disclosed and require contacting sales or downloading the pricing guide.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Earn more exposure, share your story, & connect with buyers.
features: Drive highly qualified traffic to your website with a G2 Profile.
Customize your profile to showcase your brand and stand out from the competition.
Engage prospects with CTAs, content, and exclusive deals.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Elevate your reputation with a consistent flow of authentic customer reviews.
features: Access review campaign tools, integrations, and services to increase review volume and frequency.
Share and embed quotes and reviews.
Tailor review collection to align with your needs using custom questions and exportable data.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Accelerate and optimize your pipeline with low-funnel intent signals.
features: Target accounts most likely to convert.
Accelerate sales cycles and increase win rates.
Combat churn and identify upsell opportunities with intel from buyers engaging with your competitors or category.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Convert more leads with licensed G2 Reports and Grids powered by trusted reviews.
features: Third party reports serve as ready-to-promote assets usable across channels.
Show customers social proof and lock in the win with voice-of-the-customer content.
Demonstrate credibility by becoming a category leader.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Improve your go-to-market with deeper product insights and unmatched competitive intelligence.
features: Craft a data-driven growth strategy using millions of G2 data points.
Uncover competitive intel and trend data to win more deals.
Access an always-on feed of voice-of-the-customer inputs to build better products.

original_app_metadata.name: G2 Crowd
original_app_metadata.description: G2 Crowd is a business review platform, that makes business purchasing decisions transparent and easy.
